resources.string: 笶着厛偂侽叐啝涐倗叐討論着咃扪の將莱。
%s is your health assistant, it helps you take care of your whole family\'s health and manages wearable devices easily.
We care about your privacy, and we always want to be transparent about how %s handle your data.
How would you like to sign in?
It should be between 8 and 32 digits
At least 8 characters and contain both number and letter.
Your Email address may be treated as a spam mailbox or including hazardous information. Please change your Email.
Check if your Email is correct
Our Email may be treated as a spam by your mailbox. Please check your Trash.
You may meet some network problem, or your code is outdated. Try to get another code.
Now here are some questions about you.
Your name should be in 20 digits
Allow access to your location to get the real-time weather for you.
Enable your data to our server and to synchronize your data with Apple Health
Enable your data to our server and to synchronize your data with Google Fit
Allow to use Bluetooth to connect or set up watches, accessories and more.
All your notifications from other apps, in one place
Allow access to your notifications from your phone, and view them on your device.
Run in Background to keep %s work normally
Add %s into the Allowlist for keeping it working as normal.
Allow %s avoiding being cleaned up by system Battery settings.
Sync all your health data from Apple Health
Allow access to health data from Apple Health.
Sync all your health data from Google Fit
Allow access to health data from Google Fit.
Don\'t miss any incoming call and SMS
Allow access to your contacts, call log and messages.
Allow access to photos and files in your phone to save firmware and change watch faces.
Allow to take photos with your phone through device, use your favourite photo as watch face.
Set up Accessibility for your need
Set Accessibility such as Talkback and VoiceOver in system for your need.
Make sure features on your phone and devices are set up the way you want them.
Set steps and workouts goals and make efforts to complete them.
You\'ll receive an alarm if your %s is low.
You\'ll receive an alarm if your oxygen level is lower than normal level (%s).
You\'ll receive a notification while you wake up if you have sleep apnea.
Set your last blood pressure to calibrate.
Current calibration of blood pressure is %s.
You\'ll receive an alarm if your %s is high.
It is not available with your device.
It is not available while your device doesn\'t associate with any type of %s
You\'ll receive a notification if you lack movement for a while.
You\'ll receive a notification while you\'re in some period.
You\'ll receive an alarm if your temperature is higher %s.
Follow the guide on your device.
Move your device close to your phone.
If you just turn on your device, wait a moment, then try again.
You may need to reset the device if it\'s already paired with other phone.
Make sure your device is on and charged enough. Keep it nearby.
Restart your device or get suggestions for the Support Website.
How would you like to name your %s?
Your watch face is the Home Screen.
Swipe left and right for useful health functions.
At Home Screen, Swipe down to Control Center for checking battery, silencing your watch and more.
Use Side Button on your watch
Press it to go back to Home Screen or functions.
Press and hold it to turn on or off your watch.

To get the best health measurements, wear your watch about a finger\'s width above your wrist joint. Make sure it fits so that the back of the watch stays connected to your skin without moving around.
Swipe up to Notification Center and quick view your notifications from your phone.
You can select the apps for notifications in the setting.
The vibration alert will not be available.
After unpairing, it can be bound by other phone.
At most 8 characters, supporting Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Latin, Cyrillic as well as number.
%s\'s battery may too low, or it has been out of power.
You can select or take a photo as background.
View all online faces and choose the face you like.
\"%s\" would like to Access the Camera
This lets you take photos and upload to %s
\"%s\" would like to Access your Photos
This lets you select\u0020\u0020photos and upload to %s
Oops! It looks like you\'re offline
Try again after connecting to a network.
It takes about %s to transfer this face
Do not operate your phone or %s.
Your %s should be as close as possible to your phone.
Go to view the face on your %s.
Oops! It looks like connection is lost.
Oops! It looks like something went wrong.
You can choose how sensitivity of Wake-up gesture be by sliding the knob. And turn your wrist to try it out.
High sensitivity will make your screen easily awake and consume more power.
When you set it repeated, a specific date of alarm isn\'t available.
Open your phone\'s camera, and tap %s to take a photo.
To view missed notifications, swipe up on your watch face or press the Side Button.
You\'ll receive a notification if your exercise is low in %1$ s (%2$s)
Receive a notification when you reach your goal.
Set up your Period length, Cycle length and other data to track your period and use other functions.
%s will notify you about upcoming periods.
%s will notify you when your fertile window is approaching.
Once Heart Rate Monitor is on, %s will monitor your heart regularly and notify you if your heart rate is abnormal.
You won\'t receive a notification when your heart rate is high.
You\'ll receive a notification when your heart rate exceeds %s.
This can measure your blood oxygen levels throughout the night.
You won\'t recieve a notification when your blood oxygen level is lower than normal level.
This can track your sleep throughout the day.
To update your device, you need to know all these things:
Make sure the battery of your device is over %@%
Do not leave us, almost done.
Follow steps below to reupdate your %s:
Search and connect the device named \"%s\"
Ensure all things before updating have been done
Switch off phone\'s Bluetooth if updating fails repeatedly. Change another phone and repeat the steps above.
To save your preference and sync data across phones
You can view your data after signing in again.
Your Email has been changed to
Once you apply to delete your account, we\'ll clean the following things to keep your data safe:
All data on your phone and server will be cleaned.
All devices will unbound from your account.
Your data on device will not be cleaned, please follow the steps below to clean them manually:
1. It\'s better to fall asleep before 22:00.
Staying up late may cause weak immunity and accelerate aging.
2. Go to bed and get up on time everyday.
3. Make yourself relax before going to bed, like yoga, bath, and so on.
4. Do not drink alcohol as well as caffeine or smoke before going to bed.
5. Avoid strenuous exercise before going to bed.
6. If you can\'t fall asleep for more than 30 mins, get out of your bed, and go to bed while sleepy.
7. Don\'t worry too much about your sleep quality or force yourself to fall asleep.
8. Recall some nice things, make yourself happy and comfortable.
9. If your sleep problem does not improve, consult your doctor for advice.
How to do in daily life

Heart rate is the speed of the heartbeat measured by the number of beats of the heart per minutes (bpm). The heart rate can cary according to the body\'s physical needs, including the need to absorb oxygen and excrete carbon dioxide, but is also modulated by a myriad of factors including but not limited to genetics, physical fitness, stress or psychological status, diet, drugs, hormonal status, environment, and disease as well as the interaction between and among these factors. It is usually equal or close to the pulse measured at any peripheral point.
Heart rate variability (HRV) is the physiological phenomenon of variation in the time interval between heart beats. It is measured by the variation in the beat-to-beat interval.
The maximum heart rate mutation as well as the degree of mutation is normal.
The cardiac stress ability and mental condition are good.
The maximum variation of heart rate as well as the range of variation is normal.
The heart rhythm is stable at night and the heart condition is good.
How many days does your period usually last?
How many days dose your cycle usually last?
Select the start and end dates of your last period
Ok, you can do it later.
How many weeks have you got pregnant?
Set up your information to inform your prediction
How to make the result of test accurate
1. Check that your %s is snug but comfortable on your wrist.
2. Try not to move, including your fingertips.
3. Hold your wrist in your lap or rest it on a table.
4. Try moving your %s up your arm a little.
5. Keep your wrist flat and your %s facing up.
Hold as still as you can during the measurement.
Using the optical sensor to assist in testing while %s signal is weak.
Ensure your finger is on the electrode.
This lets you take photos and upload to %s
\"%s\" would like to Access the Camera
This lets you select\u0020\u0020photos and upload to %s
\"%s\" would like to Access your Photos
Allow access to your location to search a nearby device.
These permissions will only be used when you use related functions.
Phones running different systems may have different methods to check and manage permissions.
You can check your phone’s Tips & Support or ask phone provider for help.
For searching nearby devices, tracking workouts trajectories, and providing real-time weather service.
For tracking workouts trajectories, and providing real-time weather service.
For notifying device-related and health-related messages.
For pushing apps notifications from phone to device.
For reading phone’s notifaction bar to pushing apps notifications to device.
For keeping synchronizing between phone and device, and pushing notifications in time.
For avoiding being cleaned up by system Battery settings.
For setting system accessibility such as Talkback and VoiceOver to help using.
For getting phone’s information and identify phone model.
For pushing incoming call to device.
For displaying contacts while pushing messages and incoming call.
For displaying contacts while pushing messages and incoming call, and adding favourite contact to device.
For writing and reading files on phone such as firmware and changing watch faces.
For taking photos and using as watch faces.
For using photos as watch faces from system album.
For pushing incoming call to device and calling via device.
